LanguageData.DMS_Officer01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a weapons controller at a CIC. Before being temporarily laid off due to a lack of maintenance parts for the control system, [PAWN_pronoun] job was to control the weapons systems of the task force's autonomous robots at the weapons control station to avoid accidents. Senseless killing...and fixing some mechanical issues by the way.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer01.title: Weapon Systems Officer
LanguageData.DMS_Officer02.description: Although it has been more than 3,000 years since humans have stepped out of the galaxy, due to the chronology of records and the unavoidable long time of interstellar travel, there are usually errors in everything on the target planet when they arrive. The job of [PAWN_nameDef] is to study everything on this planet, those ecosystems and organisms that change over time and various factors.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer02.title: Xeno Researcher
LanguageData.DMS_Officer03.description: [PAWN_nameDef] works for the medical department of the colonial fleet. Due to some disputes caused during a free medical tour on the surface of the planet, he had to stay briefly on the surface until the problem was resolved.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer03.title: Itinerant Medic
LanguageData.DMS_Officer04.description: [PAWN_nameDef] works for the technical department of the colonial fleet and makes technical adjustments and optimizes Automatroids for the local environment of the colonial planet. If it weren't for mandatory on-site research requirements, maybe [PAWN_pronoun] would just stay at home.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer04.title: Automatroid Engineer
LanguageData.DMS_Officer05.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the diplomatic department of the colonial fleet. Before the previous post was suspended due to the change of regime, [PAWN_pronoun], like other military attachés, was posted to various faction bases on the planet to provide contacts and deliver messages.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer05.title: Military Attaché
